text: how can I set the oauth connection with my app in native javascript if it is possible ?
Is there anyway to retrieve deleted Contacts/Deals/Companies through API call?
We actually just released this client library that you might find helpful <@UTWGHK6QG> <https://www.npmjs.com/package/@HubSpot/api-client>

<@UU9NZ1U2K> The latest version the APIs <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs-beta/overview> support an `archived` param that you can set to `true` to recieve archived (meaning not hard deleted) objects

We are using the Ticket API and see the contact association stored differently depending on the ticket source . If it is form based the contact ID is as usual stored in the VID, however if the ticket originates from email, VID is blank, the ticket interface still recalls an associated contact, but the API has no mention of an associated contact, how can we pull that ID through the API?

Hi everyone, is there any easy(proper) way of querying the contact API (either current API or v3 BETA) to get the LABELS of the properties and not just the VALUES? We are building a template feature here and making one API call for EACH property seems extremely inefficient
Are property versions/history no longer going to be available in CRM API v3?
